ARABIC: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَنْعَٰمَ لِتَرْكَبُوا۟ مِنْهَا وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is Allah who has given you livestock, some for you to ride and some to eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is God who made the cattle for you so that some you ride and some you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah it is Who has made cattle for you so that you ride some of them and from some of them you derive food.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is God Who has created cattle for you to ride and to consume as food.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is Allah Who created the animals for you, in order for you to ride some of them, and some to eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah, it is He Who has made cattle for you, that you may ride on some of them, and of some you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah is He Who made the cattle for you that you may ride on some of them, and some of them you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is God who appointed for you the cattle, some of them to ride and of some you eat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah it is Who hath appointed for you cattle, that ye may ride on some of them, and eat of some -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is God who provides livestock for you, some for riding and some for your food:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah it is Who hath appointed for you cattle, that ye may ride on some of them, and eat of others
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is Allah who created the cattle for you that you may ride some of them, and some of them you eat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is Allah Who made cattle for you, that ye may use some for riding and some for food;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah, it is He Who has made cattle for you, that you may ride on some of them and of some you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is Allah who has provided you with cattle, some that you ride and some that you eat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God is He who created the domestic animals for you—some for you to ride, and some you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:79] God it is Who made for you cattle — it is said that ‘camels’ are specifically meant here, even though it seems to signify cows and sheep also — that you may ride some of them and eat of some.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah it is Who hath appointed) created (for you cattle, that ye may ride on some of them, and eat of some) you eat of their meat
